hero.core_tension: Compressed holiday windows layered together: a short, high‑intensity brand test (S1) overlapping a retailer's shorter entry window (S2) and a tech-enabled instant reward cadence (S3) — depict competing measurement horizons and the decision to prioritize cadence vs. reach.
hero.setting: Studio backlot staged as a pop-up mockup: matte wood counter, brushed steel racks, translucent signage panels; 3/4 angle, medium distance to show collaboration and context.
hero.persona: Brand operations lead and studio producer collaborating with a visual merch assistant (operator + studio crew).
hero.action: Hands and bodies aligning printed floor plans, loyalty tokens, and sample offer cards; studio lead adjusts a directional light ribbon to suggest test cadence without showing UI.
hero.urgency_symbol: Converging light bands and narrowing ribbons of highlight that imply differing window lengths and pulse rates (symbolic timing, no clocks).
props: printed loyalty cards and enrollment tokens (physical mockups)
stacked paper SMS/reward slips (abstract, not showing screens)
sample BNPL token slips and coupon tags
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights, subtle rim light, and clean negative space for copy or overlays.
hero.alt: Brand operator and studio lead align light cues over a pop-up mockup, signaling short vs extended test windows

signal_map.structure: Concentric arcs and intersecting lattice with staggered ring widths to represent different test durations (nested windows and cohort boundaries).
elements: pulsing nodes for daily enrollment spikes
ribbons for S1 (brand), S2 (retailer), S3 (tech reward) durations
pathways showing user flow between entry, checkout, and loyalty enrollment
signal_map.motion: Flow of converging ribbons toward a focal node; nodes subtly pulse at different rates to imply timing sensitivity and measurement cadence.
signal_map.palette: Matte graphite base, warm amber highlights for brand pulses, cool cyan accents for instant rewards; materials: frosted glass planes, brass pins, satin paper texture.
signal_map.alt: Abstract map of overlapping arcs and pulsing nodes representing pop-up timing and reward flows

case_studies.scene: Tight studio vignette focused on a prototype checkout table; low-angle composition, subject framed by warm wood and brushed steel materials.
case_studies.moment: Alignment: a short, bright ribbon of light slices a longer shadow across the table to symbolize the brand’s Nov 21–Dec 12 pulse (S1) and the decision point for BNPL + cash-back offers.
case_studies.persona: Brand operations manager and studio assistant working side-by-side, hands in frame arranging physical offer artifacts.
props: paper receipt strips used as timing markers
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial with confident highlights on hands and props, soft falloff to clean negative space.
case_studies.alt: Brand operator and studio assistant position BNPL slips under a bright timing band

case_studies.scene: Slightly elevated wide-angle of a staged high-footfall doorway; subject includes a retailer field manager and studio director beside a concrete threshold and translucent signage panels.
case_studies.moment: A narrow wedge of warm light grazes the entry path, symbolizing the retailer's compressed test window (S2) and the cadence of daily enrollment measurement.
case_studies.persona: Retailer field manager and visual merch lead consulting on flow markers and on-site incentive placement.
props: incentive tags and paper tally sheets (no digital UI shown)
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial with confident side highlights, strong negative space in foreground to emphasize path and timing wedge.
case_studies.alt: Retail manager and studio director mark an entry path with a warm wedge of light

case_studies.scene: Close 3/4 framing of hands exchanging a printed SMS reward mock and a physical loyalty token; materials include matte card stock and satin metal token for tactile contrast.
case_studies.moment: A thin cyan pulse runs beneath the exchange, symbolizing the instant reward delivery and immediate redemption window (S3) and the timing decisions for conversion vs. margin.
case_studies.persona: Brand product operations lead and studio prop master collaborating on reward delivery artifacts.
props: receipt-style paper cue for redemption timing
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial high-contrast with confident highlights on hands and props, generous negative space.
case_studies.alt: Product ops and prop master exchange an instant-reward mock under a cyan pulse
